section.title: com.thealgorithms.datastructures.trees.CreateBSTFromSortedArray Class Reference
section.section:
Detailed Description
Given a sorted array. Create a balanced binary search tree from it.
Steps: 1. Find the middle element of array. This will act as root 2. Use the left half recursively to create left subtree 3. Use the right half recursively to create right subtree
The documentation for this class was generated from the following file: src/main/java/com/thealgorithms/datastructures/trees/CreateBSTFromSortedArray.java
